abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - red - yarn needle - scissors final size - diameter of 10 cm not including the drips technical notes *all rounds are joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip stitches blood splatter/coaster red round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *working on the splatter you will be making 10 drips round 4 chain 1 drip one make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts chain 3 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet into each chain across then make 2 single_crochet into the next st 6 sts drip two make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts chain 6 start in the second chain from
